segments.text: You like Titanic ? That movie is so cheesy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's not cheesy ! It's romantic . When it first came out , I saw it in the theaters five times in one week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Well the special effects might have been good in 1997 , but when you watch it today they make the film seem really cheesy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright , maybe it's a little bit cheesy . But come on , isn't it fun to go to a cheap flick once in a while ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , I have to admit that you're right . I like some pretty cheesy movies too . I love Arnold Schwarzenegger action flicks , especially " Terminator . "
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Haha , that's definitely a cheesy movie too . Did you watch it over and over again ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well ... I saw it only once , but for the next two months when I talked to people , I pretended I was the Terminator .
segments.speaker: S1
